<p><span>We put out a hotfix today, bringing the latest version of <em>First Contract</em> to <strong>0.24.2</strong>. it has everything to do with right clicks and nothing to do with <strong>Dizzle</strong>'s scenic picture. Read what's new <a href="http://bit.ly/1mNRQme"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</span></p>
Oh, nice. Thanks a lot for your really fast response
